solution

Class BinarySearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • solution.BinarySearch

  • public final class BinarySearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Questions 2a and 2b of the code test

    Write a function search that accepts 2 arguments
    2a - a collection of values
    2b - a value to find in the collection
    Author:
    Stephen Luchacha

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int binarySearch(int[] sortedArray, int search)
      Searches the sorted array of ints for the search value using the binary search algorithm
      static <T> int binarySearch(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>> sortedList, T search)
      Searches the sorted collection/list for the search object using the binary search algorithm.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • binarySearch

        public static final <T> int binarySearch(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>> sortedList,
                                         T search)
        Searches the sorted collection/list for the search object using the binary search algorithm.

        The collection must be sorted in ascending order prior to making this call
        Applicable for collections such as ArrayList, LinkedList

        Type Parameters:
        T - the class of the objects in the list
        Parameters:
        sortedList - collection of items to be searched
        search - the value to be searched
        Returns:
        index of the search if found in the sorted collection sorted in ascending order, otherwise it returns -1

      • binarySearch

        public static final int binarySearch(int[] sortedArray,
                                     int search)
        Searches the sorted array of ints for the search value using the binary search algorithm

        The array must be sorted in ascending order prior to making this call.
        ONLY applicable for array of ints

        Parameters:
        sortedArray - collection of items
        search - the value to be searched
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if not found and the first index of the value if found in the array
